original_text: And their coast was from Aroer, that is on the bank of the river Arnon, and the city that is in the midst of the river, and all the plain by Medeba;
korean_text: 그들의 지역은 아르논 골짜기 가에 있는 아로엘에서부터 골짜기 가운데 있는 성읍과 메드바 곁에 있는 온 평지와

sentences.original_text: And their coast was from Aroer,
that is on the bank of the river Arnon,
and the city that is in the midst of the river,
and all the plain by Medeba;
